title: Virtual Assistant NEEDED (Experienced) PAYS WELL!
job_overview:
I am looking for an experienced virtual assistant who is SMART, FAST and works hard. I have worked with VAs in the past and my VAs love me & I love them! 

I am looking to add someone HARD WORKING, DEDICATED, and FAST to my team as soon as possible. 

Must be technology savvy! My business is growing FAST and I need help. There will be strict deadlines for everything. This is a great job with plenty of work available, but must be willing to COMMIT and have an attention to detail. 

If this sounds like you, reply to this job post with your email for a Zoom call and share your favorite holiday that you like celebrating!
